<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.members.GetMemberBenefit_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.members.GetMemberBenefit_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.members.GetMemberBenefit_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.members.GetMemberBenefit_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.members.GetMemberBenefit_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonPolicy="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonmembers.Policy_v1_0" xmlns:commonDiagnosis="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonmembers.Policy_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonmembers.Policy_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request/response pair for member benefit retrieval</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="MemberBenefitRequest" type="tns:MemberBenefitRequest" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="MemberBenefitResponse" type="tns:MemberBenefitResponse" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="MemberBenefitRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the request for product benefits related to a member's policy and products.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestUsername" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The username of the user requesting information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaMemberId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The Bupa member id to query for the information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaPolicyId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The policy identifier associated with the member to query forinformation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaProductId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The product identifier associated with the member to query for information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaBenefitId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The identifier for the required Benefit.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DiagnosisCode" type="commonDiagnosis:Diagnosis"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The Diagnosis code and standard.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="MemberBenefitResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the response for product benefits related to a member's policy and product.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="MemberBenefit" type="commonPolicy:RemainingBenefit"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The amount of benefit left for this member on this BenefitHead/DiagnosisCode combination.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

A policy is made up of a collection of products.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaPolicyId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">BI's unique identifier for the policy.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Reference" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date from which the policy is valid.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ValidTo" type="xs:dateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date to which the policy is valid.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Broker" type="tns:Broker" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The broker who sold the policy.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Underwriting" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Whether the product is underwritten.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RelatedProducts" type="tns:ArrayOfMemberProducts" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The collection of products that make up the policy.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CurrencyCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Currency of the policy expressed as ISO currency code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfPolicies"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The collection of all policies for this member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Policy" type="tns:Policy" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Broker"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The broker who sold the policy (if applicable).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaBrokerId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's identifier for the broker.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The name of the broker.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="MemberProduct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Information on an individual product. A number of products make up a member's policy.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaProductId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's identifier for the member product.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Status" type="commonStatus:ProductStatus"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The status of the member product (e.g. Active, Lapsed)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ValidFrom" type="xs:dateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the member product is valid from.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ValidTo" type="xs:dateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the member product is valid to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AreaOfCover" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The area in which the cover applies to this member product.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="USACover" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates additional coverage in USA.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AmountRemaining" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The amount of benefit left for this member on the Product.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfMemberProducts"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encapsulates an array of products associated with a member</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="MemberProduct" type="tns:MemberProduct" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RemainingBenefit"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Provides information regarding the remaining benefit expressed as either a currency amount or remaining treatment incidences.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaBenefitGroupId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The identifier for the required Benefit Group.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RemainingAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The financial amount remain that can be claimed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Period" type="commonCoverage:LimitPeriod" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The period to which the limit applies (e.g. Per Year, Per Lifetime, Per Condition).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PerUnitRemainingAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The financial amount remain per unit that can be claimed per year.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TreatmentUnit" type="commonCoverage:TreatmentUnits" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unit of treatment measure (e.g. day, visit, procedure, course). Must contain a value if FinancialLimitPerUnit contains a value.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RemainingIncidences" type="xs:int" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The number of treatment incidences remaining.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2013 rel. 2 (http://www.altova.com) by Bupa UK (Bupa)--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonmembers.Member_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.commonmembers.Member_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonmembers.Member_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonmembers.Member_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonmembers.Member_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonAddress="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Address_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Address_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Address_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the common Member type used throughout the Bupa system</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Member" type="tns:Member" nillable="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation/> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="Member"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the common Member type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaMemberId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the member. Required format is BI-NNNN-NNNN-NNNN (e.g. BI-6000-0123-4567).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaRegistrationId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa’s unique identifier for the member’s registration. Format is NNNNN-NNNNNN (e.g. 60000-123456)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DateOfBirth" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Date of birth of member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Title" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Title of member. For example: Mr, Mrs, Miss.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FirstName" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">First / given name of member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MiddleName" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Middle name(s) of member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LastName" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Last / family name of member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RelationType" type="tns:RelationType" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates whether the relationship type of this member i.e the applicant or the relationship to the applicant</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="VIP" type="xs:boolean" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if the member is a VIP.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Nationality" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">ISO3 code for nationality country of member. For example: AUS, GBR, DNK for Australia, British and Danish respectively.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResidenceCountryCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation source="http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes" xml:lang="en">ISO3 code for member’s country of residence.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OriginalJoinDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Date member first joined Bupa.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SpecialHandling" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Flag to indicate if the member needs to be handled manually. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured within the Bupa system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a description which contains details regarding the internal fault</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RetryIndicator" type="xs:boolean" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds an indicator which described whether the fault may be rectified by retrying</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ExternalFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the ExternalFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured due to incorrect supply of data</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a description which contains details of why the external fault occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Code" type="tns:ExternalFaultCode" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a value which indicates the category of external fault generated</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the ServiceUnavailableFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured due to system being temporarily out of service</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Information" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds information which is associated with service downtime and restoration expectations</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ExternalFaultCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The list of external fault codes which indicate general reasons as to why a fault has occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="InsufficientDataSupplied"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Insufficient data has been supplied to execute the request</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="IncompatibleDataSupplied"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Incompatible data was supplied in one or more fields or data supplied was not compatible with existing data</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="GeneralValidationFailure"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A general validation error occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="RequestedDataNotFound"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The requested data was not found</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AuthorizationFailure"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The connecting client could not be authorized</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OperationNotImplemented"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The requested operation has not been implemented and is not supported</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Other"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A general error occured which could not be classified</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>
